articles.author: Ryan Britt
articles.title: 45 years ago, George Lucas peaked with the least Star Wars-esque movie ever - Inverse
articles.description: The best Star Wars movie happened in 1977. We'll never get over it. Here's why 'A New Hope,' would have still changed the world even if there had never been a sequel.
articles.content:
Imagine there is no 
Empire
.
 Before there was a Star Wars franchise, there was only Star Wars. For decades, a geeky dogma emerged that the 1977 film, while excellent, was simply the beginning of… [+7051 chars]

articles.author: Deutsche Welle (www.dw.com)
articles.title: Cannes' festive glamour clashes with reality - DW (English)
articles.description: The film festival has always combined glitz and politics, but, amid the war in Ukraine, the decision to screen a zombie comedy as the opening film and stage a "Top Gun" stunt highlight the dissonance.
articles.content: This year's Cannes has been a tale of two festivals. The 75th Festival de Cannes has delivered on its promise to "bring back cinema" after the ravages of COVID with a joyous, maskless celebration of … [+9236 chars]
